title: Creamy Artichoke Dip (Small Batch)
description: A warm and cheesy dip, perfect for a small gathering or a cozy snack, featuring the tangy flavor of marinated artichoke hearts.

ingredients.item: marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

instructions.instruction: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, half of the Parmesan cheese (1/4 cup), mozzarella cheese, minced garlic, onion powder, red pepper flakes (if using), and black pepper.
Stir until well combined and smooth.
Fold in the drained and chopped marinated artichoke hearts.
Transfer the mixture to a small oven-safe dish (approximately 5-6 inches round or equivalent).
Sprinkle the remaining 1/4 cup of Parmesan cheese over the top.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until bubbly and lightly golden brown on top.
Serve warm with crackers, pita bread, or vegetable sticks.

author: Chowboy AI
